title: Children of the Horse: Quiet Earth
description: This is the part two of the Children of the Horse Series. Quiet Earth continues the saga of Snow Fire's Journey. This is a short Novella of about 13k words.  Erin McConaha story continues. She is now known as Snow Fire, Bear Talker's woman. When Raven Eye shocks the band by announcing his journey to the Yellowstones, Bear Talker must chose between his loyalty to his father and his love for Snow Fire his wife. When they are blessed with the unusual child, Quiet Earth, he questions everything about his decision. Erin, (Snow Fire,) learns the baby she loves dearly might be walking in the shadow of their shaman, He-Who-Sees. It's not until the return of her brother that she also discovers her past is still not done with her and now threatens the baby she cherishes. Snow Fire will make the ultimate, heart breaking sacrifice for the safety of her unusual child and the deep love she has for her husband Bear Talker.
author: Elle Marlow
